name: agilechallenge-
description: to start app  you will need to  npm install on api  yarn install on ui turn on your mongo engine and then   npm run dev on api  yarn start on ui

scripts.pre-start: npm i && cd api && npm i && cd ../ui && npm i
scripts.start: npm run pre-start && concurrently --kill-others "cd api && npm start" "cd ui && npm start"
